# Pull Request Checklist

## What kind of change does this PR introduce?
- [ ] New utility class
- [ ] Component update
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Documentation only
- [ ] Other: ____________

## Does this PR update utilities.md?
- [ ] Yes, all new/updated utility classes are documented
- [ ] N/A (no utility classes changed)

## Additional Notes
Please describe any important context for reviewers here.
